message.name: BLOCK_ITEM
message.description: Message encoding a mission block item. This message is emitted upon a request for the next block item.
message.field: The name of the mission block

message.name: BLOCK_REQUEST
message.description: Request block item with the sequence number seq. The response of the system to this message should be a BLOCK_ITEM message.

message.name: BLOCK_REQUEST_LIST
message.description: Request the overall list of mission items from the system/component.

message.name: BLOCK_COUNT
message.description: This message is emitted as response to BLOCK_REQUEST_LIST by the MAV to get the number of mission blocks.
message.field: Number of mission items in the sequence
